keyMoments.title: Eric Attacks the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Eric launches his attack on the Straw Hat Pirates using his Kama Kama no Mi Devil Fruit powers, engaging Luffy with razor-sharp wind slashes from his fingernails.
keyMoments.significance: First major confrontation between Eric and Luffy in this episode, showcasing Eric's Devil Fruit abilities in action.
keyMoments.quote: You won't escape with that dragon! I'll slice you all to pieces!

keyMoments.title: Eric's Kama Kama no Tsumujikaze
keyMoments.description: Eric demonstrates his signature Devil Fruit technique, using his sharp fingernails to release razor-sharp wind slashes at Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Eric's primary fighting technique and the extent of his Kama Kama no Mi abilities.

abilities.description: Eric uses his elongated sharp fingernails to release razor-sharp wind slashes that can cut through opponents from a distance.

relationships.description: Eric works as a hired mercenary for Commodore Nelson Royal to capture Apis and Ryu.
Eric battles Luffy while trying to prevent the Straw Hats from escaping with Ryu.

evolutionMoments.description: Eric engages Luffy in combat, attacking him with wind slashes.

reveals.information: Full demonstration of Kama Kama no Tsumujikaze technique

keyMoments.title: Nami and Apis Load Ryu
keyMoments.description: Apis works with Nami to load the weakened dragon Ryu onto a cart for transport to the ship, despite the difficulty and Ryu's heavy weight.
keyMoments.significance: Highlights Apis's dedication to helping Ryu and her cooperation with the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Apis Uses Her Devil Fruit Power
keyMoments.description: Apis communicates with Ryu using her Hiso Hiso no Mi ability, reassuring the dying dragon that they will get him home safely.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Apis's unique Devil Fruit ability to communicate telepathically with animals and her bond with Ryu.
keyMoments.quote: Don't worry, Ryu. We'll get you home. I promise!

abilities.description: Apis can telepathically communicate with animals using the power of the Hiso Hiso no Mi.

relationships.description: Apis has a deep bond with the ancient dragon Ryu and is determined to help him return to Dragon's Nest.

evolutionMoments.description: Apis works tirelessly to help load Ryu and comfort him during the escape.

relationships.description: Apis trusts Luffy and the Straw Hats to help her save Ryu.
Apis works alongside Nami to transport Ryu during the escape.

evolutionMoments.description: Apis and Nami collaborate to load Ryu onto the cart.
